author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ahead of 14th Assembly session expected to sit this month, Chief Minister Jayalalithaa chaired a Cabinet meeting in the Secretariat on Sunday.

Besides the council of ministers, some senior officials were also present during the meeting.

According to sources, issues relating to the vote on account and interim budget are believed to have been discussed.

Final Assembly session

The final session of the Assembly is expected to sit in the second week of February.
title: CM chairs Cabinet meeting
